QuestData.Title: Buy A Fish A Round?
QuestData.Description: Heeeey it's my friend, the $r!$B$BI guesh you've seen me hanging 'round, but I should 'splain that I'm not drunk.$B$BI mean, look at me now! Shober as a freshwater fish!$B$BSure I like to drown my sorrowsh in some good brew now and then, but you can't inebriate a jinyu! Might as well try to drown a fish!$B$BNo, the brewsh make me shleepy, and when I shleep, I have vishions of the future.$B$B$B$BThe shtronger the brew, the more potent my dreamsh! If you bring me a drink, I'll owe you one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 5 Pandaren Plum Wine to Jogu the Drunk. Pandaren Plum Wine can be purchased from most bartenders in Pandaria.
